result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Alfonso Lorenzo Brooks

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Alfonso Lorenzo Brooks not in court.  Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris in court for Alfonso Lorenzo Brooks.  Attorney Alexander James Geocaris in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a status conference. Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued REMAND TO JUDGE. No action taken on bail.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE JUDGE ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT.
Justice Point Discharge Report, filed. Forwarded to Judge for review.

Defendant Alfonso Lorenzo Brooks in court.  Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris in court as stand-by counsel for Alfonso Lorenzo Brooks.  Attorney Dennis Murphy in court on behalf of Alexander James Geocaris for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a status conference. Defendant requests to make claims in writing. Statements made by stand-by counsel. Based on the information placed on the record, Court adjourns matter for a status conference to allow time for the defendant and stand-by counsel to communicate and complete any filings if needed to determine case posture. Case remains calendared in Branch 11.
Status conference scheduled for October 27, 2022 at 10:00 am.
JusticePoint Supervision Report, filed.
JusticePoint Status Report, filed.

Defendant Alfonso Lorenzo Brooks appeared by video.  Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris appeared by video for Alfonso Lorenzo Brooks.  Attorney Alexander James Geocaris in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Status conference held. For reasons stated on the record, court grants defense request for adjournment.
Status conference scheduled for September 29, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Status conference on August 23, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Filed: Original Transcript of PRELIMINARY HEARING (13 pages) commencing 06-29-22 by DANIELLE HOLCOMB.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Violation Report received and forwarded to Judge for review.  nk

Due to DAR reporting issues,  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 25.  Status conference scheduled for August 23, 2022 at 09:01 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Alfonso Lorenzo Brooks in court with Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris; both appear by video.  Defendant Alfonso Lorenzo Brooks in custody.  Gregg Herman appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Officer R. Macrae.  Court took judicial notice of 20CF1122.   State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Judge Franke.  Scheduling conference scheduled for July 19, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 4.  
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Alfonso Lorenzo Brooks in court with attorney Thomas Harris appearing as a friend of the court.  Defendant Alfonso Lorenzo Brooks in custody.  Alexander James Geocaris appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Yamahiro, br 34.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of maximum penalties and right to counsel.  Complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pleads not guilty.  The court appointed attorney Thomas Harris, to represent defendant in this matter at County expense at the rate of $100.00 per hour.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 29, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris in court as a friend of the court and as standby counsel on 20CF1122, defendant Alfonso Lorenzo Brooks not in court, in custody.  Dennis Patrick Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant has refused to come to court from the jail and is refusing to appear by zoom from the jail.  Court reserves a ruling as to request for competency evaluation.   Court ordered case adjourned for initial appearance in Branch 25.  Initial appearance scheduled for June 21, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris in court, defendant Alfonso Lorenzo Brooks not in court, in custody.  Dennis Patrick Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case called.  Case passed to allow defendant to be produced.
Initial appearance scheduled for June 15, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Alfonso Lorenzo Brooks not in court, defendant in custody.  Alexander James Geocaris appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Also, Stand-by Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris as to Case# 20CF01122 in court.  Both parties appear in person.
Defendant has two cases before the court.
Court was advised by the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Dept. bailiff in court that defendant is refusing to be escorted to the courtroom on today's date.

Court reviews with the parties the possible resolutions to defendant's refusal - including being forcibly removed from his cell and escorted to court.

Court orders case adjourned for initial appearance in Branch 28.

Clerk:  jms
